name: Cascade Harmony
description: Inspired by the serene beauty of the Cascade Mountains, this collection blends effortless style with eco-conscious materials. Each piece is designed to transition seamlessly from urban adventures to tranquil outdoor escapes, embodying the spirit of the Pacific Northwest.
theme: Nature's balance between urban life and outdoor exploration

name: Mist & Moss Essentials
description: Embrace the serene beauty of the Pacific Northwest with our Mist & Moss Essentials collection. This line features versatile, eco-friendly pieces designed for both urban exploration and outdoor adventures, ensuring you feel confident and comfortable in any setting.
theme: Inspired by the lush greenery and mystical fog of the Pacific Northwest, this collection highlights nature's calming palette and practical styles suitable for every occasion.

name: Cascadian Daydreams
description: Embrace the serene beauty of the Pacific Northwest with the Cascadian Daydreams collection. Featuring versatile pieces that transition seamlessly from urban adventures to serene nature escapes, this collection embodies comfort, style, and sustainability.
theme: Inspired by the lush landscapes and vibrant flora of the Cascades, this collection celebrates the harmony of nature and urban life.

name: Cascadian Whisper
description: Embrace the serene beauty of the Pacific Northwest with the Cascadian Whisper collection, featuring soft, flowing fabrics and earthy tones. This collection reflects the gentle whispers of nature, combining comfort and style for effortless everyday wear.
theme: Inspired by the tranquil landscapes and lush greenery of the Cascades, this collection emphasizes sustainability and body positivity.
